@graph.name: Claas Damken
@graph.description:
I am generally interested in the Heteroptera or true bugs as a model group to study the effects of habitat characteristics on the distribution and diversity of insects in fragmented and human-altered landscapes. 
I am currently working on true bug communities associated with dead wood, Heteroptera in urban habitats in Germany, and on the diversity of true bugs in tropical forests in Borneo
